attributes.action: bring back the BCG injections for secondary school children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I wish to have the BCG injections brought back as there are now reports of outbreaks of TB.  This is largely due to the fact that the injections have been stopped widespread and only given under special circumstances.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
